Package org.apache.tamaya.spisupport

Class RegexPropertyFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.RegexPropertyFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyFilter
    public final class RegexPropertyFilter
extends Object
implements PropertyFilter
    Predicate filtering using a regex expression operating on the key. It allows either to define the target keys to be selected (includes), or to be excluded (excludes).

      • setIncludes

        public void setIncludes​(String... expressions)
        Sets the regex expression to be applied on the key to filter the corresponding entry if matching.
        Parameters:
        expressions - the regular expression for inclusion, not null.

      • setExcludes

        public void setExcludes​(String... expressions)
        Sets the regex expression to be applied on the key to remove the corresponding entries if matching.
        Parameters:
        expressions - the regular expressions for exclusion, not null.

      • filterProperty

        public PropertyValue filterProperty​(PropertyValue valueToBeFiltered,
                                    FilterContext context)
        Description copied from interface: PropertyFilter

        Maps the current value to a new value. The resulting value will be used as the result passed to the user.

        If a filter is currently not available, it should just pass the input mapProperties to the method's output.

        Returning null will remove the entry.

        Implementation specification

        Implementations of this class must be
        • reentrant
        • thread-safe
        Specified by:
        filterProperty in interface PropertyFilter
        Parameters:
        valueToBeFiltered - the value to be filtered, which also can be null if removed by another filter.
        context - the filter context, not null.
        Returns:
        the filtered value, or null if the value should be removed alltogether.
        See Also:
        PropertyValue, FilterContext

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
